field.name: Status
field.label: 回调状态10:无需处理20:等待处理30:正在处理0:处理成功90:处理失败

field.name: Notify_Type
field.label: 通知类型:1.支付,2.退款,3.充值

item.name: getNotifyDetialsByOrderNo
item.sql: select t.Notify_Id, t.order_no, t.status, t.notify_url, t.limit_notify, t.robot_ip, t.notify_cntr, t.create_time, t.next_time, t.finish_time, t.notify_type, t1.name StatusName , t2.name NotifyTypeStatus from order_notify t left join sys_dictionary t1 on t.status = t1.value and t1.type ='NotifyStatus' left join sys_dictionary t2 on t.notify_type = t2.value and t2.type ='NotifyType' where {@t.OrderNo}

item.name: getCount
getList
item.sql: select t.*, t1.name NotifyTypeName, t2.name NotifyStatusName, dc.CHANNEL_NAME DChannelName from (select RID from (select R.RID, rownum LineNum from (select t.rowid RID from Order_Notify t where {@t.CreateTime >= to_date($ST,'yyyy-MM-dd')} {&@t.CreateTime < to_date($ET,'yyyy-MM-dd')+1} {&@t.Status} {&@t.NotifyType} {&@t.OrderNo} {&@t.DownChannelNo} order by t.Create_Time desc) R where rownum <= { :PS} * { :PI}) where LineNum > { :PS} * ({ :PI} - 1)) tab inner join Order_Notify t on t.rowid = tab.RID left join sys_dictionary t1 on t.notify_state = t1.value and t1.type = 'NotifyType' left join sys_dictionary t2 on t.notify_state = t2.value and t2.type = 'NotifyStatus' left join DOWN_CHANNEL dc on t.Down_Channel_No = dc.DOWN_CHANNEL_NO order by t.Create_Time desc
